title: Hitler to Hiroshima European Theater 1 (2007) [DVB Xvid MP3]
description:
Hitler to Hiroshima (2007) [DVB Xvid MP3]


Information
Hitler to Hiroshima is a detailed view of the horrors of combat. This 4 part World War II series is a fresh, dramatic, captivating presentation of this epic struggle like viewers have not seen before. It documents the horrifying drama as Hitler?s Germany, Tojo?s Japan, and Mussolini?s Italy join forces to enslave the free world. The series also captivates with close-up views of the epic struggle between the designs of tyranny and the will of freedom, and is a striking portrayal of the allied countries? darkest hours as they endure unrelenting attacks.
